about_the_game:
Incubus – A ghost-hunters tale - HD Textures Pack

This DLC will switch the default standard resolution world textures for high definition versions. Players on laptops, smaller screen resolutions, or small monitors, will not notice the difference.

The HD Textures Pack will use more Ram / GPU. If you find your gameplay performance affected, return to the default standard resolution by removing this DLC.
detailed_description:
Incubus – A ghost-hunters tale - HD Textures Pack

This DLC will switch the default standard resolution world textures for high definition versions. Players on laptops, smaller screen resolutions, or small monitors, will not notice the difference.

The HD Textures Pack will use more Ram / GPU. If you find your gameplay performance affected, return to the default standard resolution by removing this DLC.
